body:
So I have been playing and it's been really laggy lately and I was wondering if anyone could tell me what in the world is going on?

P.S. I am not sure if this is the right category for this.
body_tagged:
So I have been playing and it's been really laggy lately and I was wondering if anyone could tell me what in the world is going on?

P.S. I am not sure if this is the right category for this.
title: Lags lately

replies.body:
Extremely laggy, loads of spikes, compass in the lobby not working, loads of stuff, its been likes this for a while now.
Guessing you're EU
EDIT: Actually, the fact that you have "Mason" in your name means your definitely american/canadian

replies.body: It's the Server timing out for everyone recently, if not, then it's your ISP or how good/bad your ping is to the server.
replies.body_tagged: It's the Server timing out for everyone recently, if not, then it's your ISP or how good/bad your ping is to the server.

replies.body:
The server is dead .-.
Can't login with crashing :C

replies.body:
Initially I thought it was my ISP bringing me down since I continuously timeout whenever I attempt to join Avicus, but I guess that's not the case.

The CPU of the server(s) are probably bad...
